ComicInfo.Summary:
The madness outside of your door comes in, courtesy of writers John Ostrander and Del Close, and artists Don Simpson (creator of Megaton Man), Joe Orlando (DC and EC), and Bill Wray (new to Wasteland, and color artist for Batman: The Cult). Painted Cover by Timothy Truman (Creator of Scout).

ComicInfo.Title: Tipped Toes; A Stigmata; Message from the Star Worm
